[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]Connected Bed[/h1]
[h2]New! Bed Connector[/h2] You can build it over ANY other bed and get all the features of Connected Bed! Extra cool feature: Gene Extractors, Core scanners, and any other enterable buildings are also supported!
[img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/2021600103453283613/BB357F3C6CC223BF8936966702CD3C6B54C9CC93/[/img]
So now your pawns won't starve or pee their pants while you pull their brains and genes out!
[h2]Connected Bed[/h2] A new hospital bed with 4 cool features: [olist] [*]Integrated nutrient paste dripper (requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2920385763]VNPE[/url]) [*]Automatic blood draining from prisoners (requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2963116383]VRE-S[/url]) [*]Automatic blood transfusion for everyone (requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2963116383]VRE-S[/url]) [*]Optional connection to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836308268]DBH[/url] for water and bladder needs [/olist]
You can use it with both [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2920385763]Vanilla Races Expanded - Sanguophage[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2963116383]Vanilla Nutrient Paste Expanded[/url] simultaneously or with just one of them. [list] [*]fully mimics vanilla Hospital Bed [*]requires research of Hospital Beds and Nutrient Paste (both vanilla) [*]stuffable [*]costs 110 metallic + 6 components [*]requires construction skill 10 to build [*]consumes 25 power (VNPE external dripper needs 50) [*]safe to add/remove mid-game [*]configurable thresholds in mod's config [/list]
Still no custom textures here (I've got trotter hands), just slightly greenish handles, like most VNPE things.
